Uses of Class
camzup.core.Knot4

Packages that use Knot4 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Knot4 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Knot4 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Knot4 Knot4.adoptForeHandle​(Knot4 source)
    Adopts the fore handle of a source knot.
    Knot4 Knot4.adoptHandles​(Knot4 source)
    Adopts the fore handle and rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot4 Knot4.adoptRearHandle​(Knot4 source)
    Adopts the rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot4 Knot4.alignHandles()
    Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
    Knot4 Knot4.alignHandlesBackward()
    Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot4 Knot4.alignHandlesForward()
    Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot4 Knot4.AbstrEasing.apply​(Knot4 origin, Knot4 dest, java.lang.Float step, Knot4 target)
    A clamped interpolation between the origin and destination.
    abstract Knot4 Knot4.AbstrEasing.applyUnclamped​(Knot4 origin, Knot4 dest, float step, Knot4 target)
    The interpolation to be defined by subclasses.
    Knot4 Knot4.Lerp.applyUnclamped​(Knot4 origin, Knot4 dest, float step, Knot4 target)
    Eases between two knots by a step using the formula (1.0 - t) * a + t * b .
    static Knot4 Curve4.eval​(Curve4 curve, float step, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a knot on the curve.
    static Knot4 Curve4.evalFirst​(Curve4 curve, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Knot4 Curve4.evalLast​(Curve4 curve, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegCatmull​(float xPrevAnchor, float yPrevAnchor, float zPrevAnchor, float wPrevAnchor, float xCurrAnchor, float yCurrAnchor, float zCurrAnchor, float wCurrAnchor, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, float wNextAnchor, float xAdvAnchor, float yAdvAnchor, float zAdvAnchor, float wAdvAnchor, float tightness, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegCatmull​(Vec4 prevAnchor, Vec4 currAnchor, Vec4 nextAnchor, Vec4 advAnchor, float tightness, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegLinear​(float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, float wNextAnchor, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets a knot from a line segment.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegLinear​(Vec4 nextAnchor, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets a knot from a line segment.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegQuadratic​(float xControl, float yControl, float zControl, float wControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, float wNextAnchor, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a quadratic curve.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegQuadratic​(Vec4 control, Vec4 nextAnchor, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of a quadratic curve.
    Knot4 Curve4.get​(int i)
    Gets a knot from the curve by an index.
    Knot4 Curve4.getFirst()
    Gets the first knot in the curve.
    Knot4 Curve4.getLast()
    Gets the last knot in the curve.
    Knot4 Knot4.mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Knot4 Knot4.mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Knot4 Knot4.mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    Knot4 Curve4.removeAt​(int i)
    Returns and removes a knot at a given index.
    Knot4 Curve4.removeFirst()
    Returns and removes the first knot in the curve.
    Knot4 Curve4.removeLast()
    Removes and returns the last knot in the curve.
    Knot4 Knot4.reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    Knot4 Knot4.scale​(float scale)
    Scales this knot by a factor.
    Knot4 Knot4.scale​(Vec4 scale)
    Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleForeHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the fore handle by a factor.
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleForeHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the fore handle to a magnitude
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleHandlesBy​(float scalar)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle by a factor.
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleHandlesTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle to a magnitude.
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleRearHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the rear handle by a factor.
    Knot4 Knot4.scaleRearHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the rear handle to a magnitude
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float wCoord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float wCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore, float wFore)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float wCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore, float wFore, float xRear, float yRear, float zRear, float wRear)
    Sets the knot's coordinate, fore handle and rear handle by component.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Knot2 source)
    Sets this knot from a 2D source knot.

    For the purpose of promoting 2D curves to 4D.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Knot3 source)
    Sets this knot from a 3D source knot.

    For the purpose of promoting 3D curves to 4D.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Knot4 source)
    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 foreHandle, Vec2 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of 2D vectors.

    For the purpose of promoting 2D curves to 4D.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle, Vec3 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of 3D vectors.

    For the purpose of promoting 3D curves to 4D.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Vec4 coord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Vec4 coord, Vec4 foreHandle)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot4 Knot4.set​(Vec4 coord, Vec4 foreHandle, Vec4 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of vectors.
    static Knot4 Knot4.smoothHandles​(Knot4 prev, Knot4 curr, Knot4 next, Vec4 carry)
    Smoothes the handles of a knot with reference to a previous and next knot.
    static Knot4 Knot4.smoothHandlesFirst​(Knot4 curr, Knot4 next, Vec4 carry)
    Smoothes the fore handle of the first knot in an open curve.
    static Knot4 Knot4.smoothHandlesLast​(Knot4 prev, Knot4 curr, Vec4 carry)
    Smoothes the rear handle of the last knot in an open curve.
    Knot4 Knot4.translate​(Vec4 v)
    Translates this knot by a vector.
    Methods in camzup.core that return types with arguments of type Knot4 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Iterator<Knot4> Curve4.iterator()
    Returns an iterator, which allows an enhanced for-loop to access the knots in a curve.

    Append a knot to the curve's list of knots.
    Curve4 Curve4.appendAll​(Knot4... kn)

    static Vec4 Knot4.bezierPoint​(Knot4 a, Knot4 b, float step, Vec4 target)
    Returns a coordinate given two knots and a step.
    static Vec4 Knot4.bezierTangent​(Knot4 a, Knot4 b, float step, Vec4 target)
    Returns a tangent given two knots and a step.
    static Vec4 Knot4.bezierTanUnit​(Knot4 a, Knot4 b, float step, Vec4 target)
    Returns a normalized tangent given two knots and a step.
    int Knot4.compareTo​(Knot4 knot)
    Compares this knot to another based on a comparison between coordinates.
    boolean Curve4.contains​(Knot4 kn)
    Evaluates whether a knot is contained by this curve.
    static Knot4 Curve4.eval​(Curve4 curve, float step, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a knot on the curve.
    static Knot4 Curve4.evalFirst​(Curve4 curve, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Knot4 Curve4.evalLast​(Curve4 curve, Knot4 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.
    static Vec4 Knot4.foreDir​(Knot4 knot, Vec4 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a direction, rather than as a point.
    static float Knot4.foreMag​(Knot4 knot)
    Returns the magnitude of the knot's fore handle, i.e., the Euclidean distance between the fore handle and the coordinate.
    static Vec4 Knot4.foreVec​(Knot4 knot, Vec4 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a vector, rather than as a point.
    static Knot4 Knot4.fromSegCatmull​(float xPrevAnchor, float yPrevAnchor, float zPrevAnchor, float wPrevAnchor, float xCurrAnchor, float yCurrAnchor, float zCurrAnchor, float wCurrAnchor, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, float wNextAnchor, float xAdvAnchor, float yAdvAnchor, float zAdvAnchor, float wAdvAnchor, float tightness, Knot4 prev, Knot4 next)

    static float Knot4.rearMag​(Knot4 knot)
